name: Wild Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family: Earthy & Woody..Scent Type: Citrus & Woods..Key Notes: Velvety Peach, Charismatic Tuberose Absolute, Creamy Sandalwood..Fragrance Description: Wild Eau de Parfum is a lush floral perfume featuring notes of charismatic tuberose absolute, luscious peach, and creamy sandalwood that evokes the scent of unbridled possibility...About the Bottle: Inspired by an antique ink flask, the bottle is sensuous, smooth, and comfortable to hold, with fluted glass panels. Ribbed glass is a signature look seen throughout The Maker Hotel, from fragrance and candles, glassware, and lighting fixtures. Made with post-consumer-recycled glass, The Maker uses 27 percent less glass than traditional perfume bottles and C02-free production methods...About the Fragrance: Inspired by a night of unbridled possibility..Their energy is electric, their vibe contagious. Intense and sophisticated, they hold nothing back. A glint in their eye, an uninhibited laughu2014they command the moment...Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: Alcohol denat., Fragrance (parfum), Water (eau), Benzyl Salicylate, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Linalool.  .....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent.

shades.shade_name: 1.7 oz / 50 mL eau de parfum spray
